post.body: Went well the doctor was great. He said "Oh, No! I have never seen this much blood in my life!"
I think it was about what I expected. The feeling is not really pain, more like being kicked...
no, he was joking. There was barely ay blood at all.
ahhh, ice....
Fazolis has surprisingly good parmesean chicken.
fin!
scalpel, pliers, sheers? !
waiting for doctor now.
at office. receptionist gave me a viagra pen light.
I am ready to leave the house. Too bad I have to wait an hour...
Anxiety rising as the big day approaches
testing twit today
testing tiny twitter
It has been requested I update from the table tomorrow. Let it be written, let it be done!
Think I got it figured out
Setting up a twitter account
Going to watch Hellboy 2 with the wife tonight. Is this a good cuttle movie?
Dinner was awesome. Traffic out of parking garage not s much.
Too busy for lunch today. Why arepeople working? Take the day off so I can be lazy!
Holiday shopping. Who loves it? Not me...
